title: Edit the Last Commit
description: Git is a powerful version control system that allows developers to track changes made to their codebase. One of the most common tasks when working with Git is to edit the last commit. This can be useful when you need to make small changes to a commit that you have already made.

meta.title: Edit the Last Commit: A Git Versioning Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to edit the last Git commit without changing its message, a useful skill for developers.
meta.keywords: version control, git labs, git, commit, update, git playground, edit

verify.name: Verify for successful editing
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
